hotels.title: Cyprus Beachfront Bliss with Restaurant Suspended above the Sea
hotels.description: Overlooking Akrotiri Bay, Crowne Plaza Limassol, an IHG Hotel, delivers beachside bliss while still being conveniently close to the city centre. Savour traditional cuisine at La Brezza, a restaurant suspended above the sea, while enjoying breathtaking vistas. Rejuvenate yourself with a spa treatment or bask in the Mediterranean sun while attended to diligently by waiters beside a seafront pool. Come evening, allow the soothing sounds of crashing waves serenade you to a deep slumber.
